about_the_game:
In Tetris Effect: Connected, the in-game soundtrack is essentially composed in real time based on the user’s actions. The mixes in the original soundtrack were thoughtfully crafted by Hydelic, sequenced and composed (almost entirely separately from the game) as full tracks to be played on their own.

UPDATE MARCH 9, 2023: The digital soundtrack new includes 51 songs in MP3 and FLAC format, including the fan favorite “Connected (Yours Forever)” featuring Kate Brady.

Album Notes

Original Music by Hydelic
© 2020~2023 Enhance Experience Inc. Performed, produced and mixed by Hydelic / Courtesy of Resonair / Published by Enhance Experience Inc.

Composers: Noboru Mutoh and Takako Ishida (Track 4, 11, 13, 17, 20, 22), Takako Ishida (Track 10), Noboru Mutoh and Kate Brady (Track 1, 29, 31, 41, 42), Noboru Mutoh and Mechi Pieretti (Track 24, 30), Noboru Mutoh and Alina Renae (Track 26), Noboru Mutoh and Nintendo (Track 49). All other tracks composed by Noboru Mutoh.

Track 1, 29, 31, 42 vocals by Kate Brady.

Track 10 “City Lights” engineered by Satoru Ikeda and Shinichi Ishizuka. Featuring piano by Takako Ishida and drums by Yoshinori Imai.

Track 24 and 30 “World of Colors” vocals by Mechi Pieretti, guitar by Kat McDowell.

Track 26 "So They Say" vocals by Alina Renae.
